Wagner Labor ArchiveElmer Holmes Bobst Library70 Washington Square South10th FloorNew York, NY 10012(212) 998-2630tamiment.wagner@nyu.eduThis finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace 2017-08-02T13:27:00July 2017

Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Harvard Graduate Student and Teaching Fellows Union Records
Lasser, Carolyn
Harvard Graduate Student and Teaching Fellows Union
TAM.077
.75 Linear Feet in 1 manuscript box and 1 half manuscript box.
1967-1978 bulk The Harvard Graduate Students and Teaching Fellows Union was formed by 156 teaching fellows on March 13, 1972 in response to a change in the financial aid programs available to graduate students. The Union remained in existence through the 1972-1973 school year. This collection contains correspondence, membership lists, union statements, leaflets, newspaper clippings, posters and song lyrics. Materials are in English. Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please contact tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access.
Access Restrictions
Materials are open to researchers. Please contact the Tamiment Library & Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives for more information and to schedule an appointment, tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu or 212-998-2630.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Collection was acquired from Carolyn Lasser in 1978. The accession number associated with this collection is 1978.017.
Historical Note
The Harvard Graduate Students and Teaching Fellows Union was formed by 156 teaching fellows on March 13, 1972 in response to a change in the financial aid programs available to graduate students. The Union remained in existence through the 1972-1973 school year but no agreement was ever reached between the Union and the University.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Harvard Graduate Student and Teaching Fellows Union Records; TAM 077; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Scope and Content Note
This collection contains correspondence, membership lists, union statements, leaflets, newspaper clippings, posters and song lyrics. There is also material from teaching assistant unions at other campuses. The collection covers the years 1967-1974, with the bulk of the material covering union activity from 1972-1973.
Use Restrictions
Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives has no information about copyright ownership for this collection and is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from it. Materials in this collection, which were created in 1967-1978, are expected to enter the public domain in 2047.
Arrangement
The materials in the collection were arranged alphabetically by subject.
Processing Information
The collection was arranged by an archivist and duplicate material was disposed of sometime prior to 2017.
